36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ka'b bin 'Iyad narrated that the Prophet (s.a.w) said:"Indeed there is a fitnah for every Ummah, and the Fitnah for my Ummah is wealth

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ فِتْنَةَ هَذِهِ الأُمَّةِ فِي الْمَالِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About 'The Fitnah of this Ummah is waelth
